title: Adult Science Vocabulary Acquisition Project Through Natural Reading

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge at the middle and high school level, fundamental English reading comprehension
context.additional_context: Learners engage in a blended environment where they read scientific texts on personal devices and submit project outcomes via collaborative platforms.

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce the spelling of 20 new vocabulary words encountered in scientific texts with 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain the meaning of acquired scientific terms using contextual clues with 70% accuracy.
Learners can write three mini-reports appropriately utilizing acquired scientific terminology in project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
